word: H8505 - תָּכַן - tâkan - taw-kan' - Bear up - தாங்கிக்கொள்

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - சோதி, நிறு, நிறுத்துப்பார், செம்மை, அளவைப் பிரமாணி, நிலைநிறுத்து, பிரமாணி, அளவிடு, எண்ணு
to regulate, to measure, to estimate, to ponder, to balance, to make even, to level, to weigh, to be equal, to be weighed out, to test, to prove
2) to be made even (or right), to be adjusted to the standard
c) (Piel) to weigh out, to mete out
1) to be weighed out, to be measured out

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to balance, that is, measure out (by weight or dimension); figuratively to arrange, equalize, through the idea of levelling (mentally estimate, test): - bear up, direct, be ([un-]) equal, mete, ponder, tell, weigh.
Cognate: H4971, H8505, H8506, H8507, H8508
